languages.text: Лорд-капитану предстоит занять место Теодоры фон Валанциус в роли правител{mf|я|ьницы} протектората. Чтобы успешно управлять им, Вольному Торговцу предстоит освоить все аспекты своей новой власти.

The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану предстоит занять место Теодоры фон Валанциус в роли правител{mf|я|ьницы} протектората. Чтобы успешно управлять им, Вольному Торговцу предстоит освоить все аспекты своей новой власти.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the trade empire. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the trade empire. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the trade empire. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

languages.text: 领主舰长将会取代西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的位置，成为王朝的新任统治者。为了顺利统治王朝，行商浪人必须尽可能掌握{mf|他|她}的新权力方方面面的事宜。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长将会取代西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的位置，成为王朝的新任统治者。为了顺利统治王朝，行商浪人必须尽可能掌握{mf|他|她}的新权力方方面面的事宜。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンはシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスに代わって保護領の統治者となった。支配を成功へと導くためにも、自由開拓者は新たに獲得した力のあらゆる側面をマスターしなければならない。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンはシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスに代わって保護領の統治者となった。支配を成功へと導くためにも、自由開拓者は新たに獲得した力のあらゆる側面をマスターしなければならない。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe tomar el relevo de Theodora von Valancius como gobernante del protectorado. Para asegurar su futuro, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tendrá que dominar cada uno de los aspectos de su nuevo poder.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe tomar el relevo de Theodora von Valancius como gobernante del protectorado. Para asegurar su futuro, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tendrá que dominar cada uno de los aspectos de su nuevo poder.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain nimmt den Platz von Theodora von Valancius als {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} des Protektorats ein. Um es erfolgreich zu regieren, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sämtliche Aspekte {mf|seiner|ihrer} neu gewonnenen Macht beherrschen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain nimmt den Platz von Theodora von Valancius als {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} des Protektorats ein. Um es erfolgreich zu regieren, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sämtliche Aspekte {mf|seiner|ihrer} neu gewonnenen Macht beherrschen.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} va prendre la place de Théodora von Valancius à la tête du protectorat. Pour le gérer avec succès, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit maîtriser tous les aspects de son nouveau pouvoir.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} va prendre la place de Théodora von Valancius à la tête du protectorat. Pour le gérer avec succès, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit maîtriser tous les aspects de son nouveau pouvoir.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, protektoranın hükümdarı olarak Theodora von Valancius'un yerini alacak. Diyarlarını başarıyla yönetebilmek için Hür Tacir, yeni elde ettiği bu gücün her yönünde uzmanlaşmak zorunda.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is to take Theodora von Valancius's place as the ruler of the protectorate. To command it with success, the Rogue Trader must master every aspect of {mf|his|her} newly acquired power.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, protektoranın hükümdarı olarak Theodora von Valancius'un yerini alacak. Diyarlarını başarıyla yönetebilmek için Hür Tacir, yeni elde ettiği bu gücün her yönünde uzmanlaşmak zorunda.
